root.message: The SDG_GOAL field for indicator 8-7-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: 8 PROMOTING INCLUSIVE AND SUSTAINABLE ECONOMIC GROWTH, FULL AND PRODUCTIVE JOBS AND DECENT WORK FOR ALL
8 PROMOVER O CRESCIMENTO ECONÓMICO INCLUSIVO E SUSTENTÁVEL, O EMPREGO PLENO E PRODUTIVO E O TRABALHO DIGNO PARA TODOS
